highlights: Introduced a time and byte based cutoff for long running tasks causing duplicate computation, reducing expenses by 66%
Built an autonomous content sampler that gives customer's probability of sensitive data discovery per file, increasing job creation by 13%
Implemented a security testing worflow to CI/CD pipeline, maintaining a rigorous standard of authorization and authentication verification
Designed an allow listing service that allows customers to provide custom regex to whitelist from sensitive data detections
Sole responsibility for expanding Macie, a machine learning AWS Service that classifies sensitive information in text-based files to also include JPEG and PNG files
Utilizing MMOCR, a deep learning OCR library to facilitate extraction and classification of text maintaining an F-Score requirement of 0.9
Writing a design document outlining business opportunity, offering a prospective project architecture, and detailing the quantitative success criteria
Providing a complete test suite to enable integration into Amazon Macie and sequentially deploy products into production
Successfully maintaining a performance requirement of 1.4 million tasks to classify images per hour
Designed a web bases test suite for 3 test environments using React and Spring, leading to 21% faster testing
Optimized API to increase time-to-first-byte by 6% 􀀀 Developed a simulator for testing and monitoring multiple API’s providing 78% code coverage
Automated reformatting of test data using Python scripts 􀀀 Deployed a Java-based international money transfer application
Built a dashboard to track API metrics, invoke alarms, and provide insight to business owners for future improvements.
